message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. That's a bit out of my price range. Would you be willing to come down to $120?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can do $160, but I'm not going any lower than that.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we split the difference and settle at $140?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $140, Bob. I can do $155, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
Alice, $155 is very close, but I'm on a tight budget.  Would you consider $145 to make this a deal?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob. I can do $152, but I'm not budging much further than that.
